name: St Gregory Of Nyssa Episcopal Church
description: Every Saturday from 11 am to 1 pm, The Food Pantry opens its doors at St. Gregory’s to provide fresh, healthy groceries to more than 500 neighbors at risk of hunger.
fullDescription: Every Saturday from 11 am to 1 pm, The Food Pantry opens its doors at St. Gregory’s to provide fresh, healthy groceries to more than 500 neighbors at risk of hunger.
whatTheyOffer: Every Saturday from 11 am to 1 pm, The Food Pantry opens its doors at St. Gregory’s to provide fresh, healthy groceries to more than 500 neighbors at risk of hunger.
address: 500 De Haro Street, San Francisco, CA, 94107
